cards.title: Lady Petrova App
cards.description: App idea for Petrova's business — details TBD

cards.title: Prompt Packs for Sale
cards.description: 7 prompt templates built (image 3, video 2, text 1, workflow 1). Needs 15+ more before launch. Also needs Gumroad account + hero image.

cards.title: Telegram Topics
cards.description: Move bot output to a Telegram Forum Group with topics (Newsletter, System, Email, X Drafts, Standup, General). Reduces noise, allows per-topic muting.
notes: OpenClaw supports forum topics natively. Raphael creates group, Fragile wires crons.

cards.title: Google Migration (Proton → Gmail)
cards.description: Consolidate connect@raphaelruz.com email from Proton to Google Workspace + merge raphael.ruz@gmail.com account (bookmarks, contacts, YouTube).
notes: Proton renews Nov 7 2026. Cron reminder set for Sep 7. Full migration plan TBD.

cards.title: Product Intelligence Newsletter (Daily)
cards.description: Daily 6am AEDT email + voice briefing. 41 RSS feeds + 12 Brave queries + Bird CLI. 1,886 KB entries. Template: newsletter-base.html. Cron: 19:00 UTC.
notes: Running reliably since Feb 2026. 9 new RSS feeds added Feb 14.

cards.title: Product Intelligence → Paid Newsletter (Beehiiv)
cards.description: Turn PI into paid product. Beehiiv platform, pi.raphaelruz.com domain, $5/mo pro tier. Spec written, templates built, landing page live, API module coded.
notes: Templates: Dark Ops + Pastel Editorial previews live

cards.title: Second Brain Dashboard
cards.description: NextJS app for reviewing memories, KB, tasks, and projects. Live at port 3002, Tailscale Funnel on port 8443.
notes: Features: Memory timeline, Long-term memory, KB search, Tasks kanban, Projects browser, Unified search

cards.title: X Content Strategy
cards.description: Draft → approve → post flow for @FR491L3. Strategy doc written. First week of drafts (Feb 17-23) revised. Raphael uncomfortable with posting — revisit when ready.
notes: Raphael prefers curating/commenting over original hot takes
Consider newsletter highlights as X content instead

cards.title: GenAI Knowledge Base
cards.description: 1,886 entries from 41 RSS feeds + 12 Brave queries + Bird CLI. Auto-syncs daily 08:00 UTC. AI search API on port 3001.
notes: API: port 3001, systemd kanban-api, bearer auth

cards.title: Beehiiv ID Verification
cards.description: Beehiiv requires identity check before API access. Raphael started signup but needs to complete KYC.
notes: Newsletter name: Product Intelligence, URL: productintelligence.beehiiv.com, Frequency: Daily

cards.title: Accidental Tweet Deleted
cards.description: Raphael deleted the bird CLI accident tweet from @FR491L3.

cards.title: Visby CF License Resolved
cards.description: Squarespace license = Squarespace only. Use Inter for external properties (Beehiiv, GitHub Pages, Second Brain). No purchase needed.

cards.title: Second Brain v1 Built + Deployed
cards.description: NextJS app with memory timeline, KB search, tasks, projects, unified search. Dark theme, brand colours. systemd + Tailscale Funnel.

cards.title: PI Landing Page Live
cards.description: Product Intelligence landing page on GitHub Pages with signup form placeholder, tier comparison, FAQ.

cards.title: 9 New RSS Feeds Added
cards.description: Mollick, AI Snake Oil, Interconnects, Lilian Weng, AiEdge, Ruder, AI Models, Synced, Guardian AI. Total: 41 feeds.

cards.title: gogcli Installed
cards.description: Google CLI v0.10.0 installed at /usr/local/bin/gog. Auth setup deferred — Google migration planned for Sep 2026.

cards.title: Beehiiv API Module Built
cards.description: Node.js module at ~/clawd/scripts/beehiiv-api.js — publishPost, getSubscribers, getStats. Ready to wire.

cards.title: X Content Strategy + Drafts
cards.description: Strategy doc + 2 weeks of drafts written. Raphael reviewing approach — prefers curating over original takes.

cards.title: OpenClaw Updated to 2026.2.14
cards.description: Updated from 2026.2.12. Telegram polls, cron delivery fix, past-due cron fix, MEDIA path support.

cards.title: 5 Skills Created + Crons Rewired
cards.description: newsletter, kb-sync, health-check, email-check, standup skills at ~/.openclaw/skills/. All 5 crons reference skills.

cards.title: Subagents → OpenRouter Codex
cards.description: Switched from openai/gpt-5.2 to openrouter/openai/gpt-5.2-codex. Bypasses OpenAI billing block.

cards.title: KB AI Search API
cards.description: Express server on port 3001, OpenRouter GPT-4.1-mini, bearer auth + rate limiting. systemd: kanban-api. Tailscale Funnel.

cards.title: RSS + Brave Sources Fixed (0 errors)
cards.description: Fixed Meta AI, Cognitive Revolution, Karpathy feeds. Removed dead feeds, replaced with Brave queries. Rate limiting fixed with tier system + delays.

cards.title: PI Spec + Templates + Landing Copy
cards.description: Full newsletter product spec, Beehiiv setup guide, Dark Ops + Pastel Editorial templates, landing page copy.

cards.title: Tailscale Connected + Funnel Active
cards.description: EC2 (100.106.131.20) + iPhone (100.69.163.70). Funnel on ports 443 (API) and 8443 (Second Brain).

cards.title: Model Stack: Opus 4.6 + Kimi K2.5 + Codex
cards.description: Primary: anthropic/claude-opus-4-6. Fallback: openrouter/moonshotai/kimi-k2.5. Subagents: openrouter/openai/gpt-5.2-codex.

cards.title: All Crons Fixed (isolated + agentTurn)
cards.description: 7 active crons, all using isolated + agentTurn pattern with delivery mode none.

cards.title: 4 Credentials Rotated
cards.description: Gateway, Telegram, OpenRouter, Anthropic keys all rotated and verified.

cards.title: Bird CLI + X Research Skill
cards.description: Bird CLI installed for X data (bookmarks/likes/search). x-research skill created.

cards.title: GitHub Issue Filed: Fallback Bug
cards.description: openclaw/openclaw#12627 — fallback on validation errors. Filed and acknowledged.

cards.title: SOUL.md Rewritten
cards.description: Personality, opinions, brevity, humour. No more corporate drone voice.

cards.title: Summarize CLI Installed
cards.description: @steipete/summarize for YouTube/podcast summaries. Config: xai/grok-3-mini.
